Richardson.Emmett J. Conrad High School: Emmett J. Conrad, MD High School is a public high school located in Vickery Meadow, Dallas, Texas (USA). Emmett J. Conrad High School, which covers grades 9-12, is a part of the Dallas Independent School District. The school competes in UIL district 11-5A. In 2015, the school was rated "Met Standard" by the Texas Education Agency.
